tool_description: A package tracking API with just two endpoints. This API is designed for use with the Where's my Package Google sheets app.
name: Where's my Package
title: Where's my Package

api_list.name: GET Tracking Information
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a JSON with tracking information for the carrier and tracking number passed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wheres-my-package.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/service/gettracking/LG005205142US/CANADA_POST"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wheres-my-package.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wheres-my-package.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/service/gettracking/{tracking_number}/{carrier}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wheres-my-package.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
